com.jaunt.util

Class ProxyAuthenticator

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.net.Authenticator
      • com.jaunt.util.ProxyAuthenticator

  • public class ProxyAuthenticator
extends Authenticator
    Represents the system-level credentials necessary for performing proxy authentication.
    Since:
    0.9.9
    Author:
    Tom Cervenka

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.net.Authenticator

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void setCredentials(String username, String password)
      Sets the ProxyAuthenticator with the specified username and password; The System properties http.proxyHost and http.proxyPort should be set before calling this method.
